content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows an object with a red circle indicating the user's gaze on a slanted groove. The groove orientation is diagonal, requiring calculation of the stiffness matrix.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [205.5, 72.5, 72.5],
    [72.5, 122.5, -22.5],
    [72.5, -22.5, 122.5]
  ]
}
```
